text: hi my name is Rebecca and in today's

whether it's your general vocabulary or

one word you actually learn three words
each time at least three words okay so
the strategy is this the point is that
the most difficult part of vocabulary
building is actually learning the word
and attaching the meaning to the word so
the hard part is when you're trying to
understand and remember the meaning of
the word once you understand that it
becomes much easier for you to expand
your vocabulary by learning not only
that word but a few other words that are
in that family of words now I put on the

manage is the verb the person now for

managing is called

management you've now learned three
